jd: From: Abdul mannan, Tech Brand Staffing info@techbrandstaffing.com Reply to: info@techbrandstaffing.com MUST HAVE ALL EXPERIENCE IN ALL SKILLS Java/Angular Developer (10+) with JSP, Servlets, JDBC, PL/SQL, MSSQL, Eclipse, Tomcat, Azure, DevOps, CI/CD and Agile experienceLocation: Richmond, VA (VDOT)Duration: 7 MonthsThis position requires that the resource works onsite 2 -3 days a week or as needed. SkillRequiredyears reqYears UsedExperience with Java, J2EE Architecture, JSP, Servlets, JDBCRequired8 Experience with PL/SQL, MSSQL ProgrammingRequired6 Experience with front end technologies using AngularRequired4 Experience with Eclipse, TomcatRequired6 Experience with Agile SDLC best practicesRequired6 Experience with Azure DevOps or similar for code management and CI/CD pipelineRequired6 Experience with C#/.NETDesired3 Description:This position requires that the resource works onsite 2 -3 days a week or as needed.VDOT is looking for experienced Java/angular developers with 8 + years experience in IT.•Experience with Java, J2EE architecture, JSP, Servlets, XML, JSON, XSL , SQL, PL/SQL, JDBC, OO Design, CSS, HTML, AJAX, eclipse, Tomcat, JavaScript and knowledgeable with the Windows platform.• Ability to design and code using modern day frameworks such as Angular, Typescript and other web-related technologies.•Experience with .Net and C# is a huge plus.•Experience with relational database design and development with Oracle and MSSQL•Experience in software design, development, and testing of web-based software applications•Strong conceptual, analytical, and problem-solving abilities•Strong interpersonal and written/verbal communication skills
